item.title: Honor & Certification
item.description:
2024 Chancellor’s Gold Medalist
Awarded for being the top graduate at Daffodil International University.
2024 Research Award
Achieved remuneration for scholarly articles in reputed indexed Journals. Certification
2023 SQL for Data Science: University of California, Davis
Advance SQL queries, data manipulation, problem solving with data, data analysis and interpretation. Certification
2023 Machine Learning with Python: IBM
Different ML algorithm exploration and performed related project works on classification, regression, and clustering. Certification
2023 Deep Learning with PyTorch - Image Segmentation: Coursera
Performed Image Segmentation Task. Certification
2023 Machine Learning Pipelines with Azure ML Studio: Coursera
Adult Income Prediction using Two-Class Boosted Decision Tree Classififer Certification
2023 Applied Data Science Lab: Worldquant University
Got certification for completing 8 projects about data science. Certification
2023 Create Charts and Dashboard using Google Sheets: Coursera
Basic functions and generate several charts to visualize data as well as dynamic dashboard creation. Certification
2023 Introduction to Microsoft Excel: Coursera
Coursera Project Network. Certification
2019 - 2022 DIU Merit Based Scholarship
Got scholarship for all the 12 semesters at my university based on academic result.
2020 Network Academy Learn A Thon
Completed a course on introduction to cyber security.
2015, 2017 Government Scholarship
Got scholarship based on the SSC and HSC result from my parent organization.
2012 Government Scholarship (JSC)
Got a govt. scholarship in Junior School Certificate Examination - General Grade
2009 Government Scholarship (PSC)
Got a govt. scholarship in Primary School Certificate Examination - Talentpool.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Netflix Data Analysis


A data analysis project for analysing the netflix data. Keywords: Tableau

Applied Data Science Lab


I have completed 8 projects in the Applied Data Science Lab organized by WorldQuant University. It was a great experience because it helped me to explore some new aspects of data science I did not acknowledge before. Keywords: Data Analysis, Python, MongoDB, Machine Learning, API

Multi-class Fish Classification


A Deep Learning algorithm known as Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) is utilized to classify 12 fish species. Data augmentation helps to learn the structure of data in this work. Keywords: Deep Learning, CNN

VRant üîóWebsite


Using this web app, a user can get the feeling of a virtual restaurant. We will help people to get healthy and nutritious foods through our website. Keywords: HTML, CSS, Java Script, PHP

Multiclass Emotion Recognition from Bangla


Various Machine Learning algorithms are applied to detect the six basic ekman‚Äôs emotions from Bangla text. The emotions were anger, surprise, disgust, enjoyment, fear, and sadness.
Keywords: Python, Machine Learning

Academic Point


This project is about Student Information System using Python and here we have chosen SQLite for storing information in a SQL database. In this console application, there are three section which is Student Panel, Teacher Panel and Admin Panel. Here we focused on our SQL database. Keywords: Python, SQLite

Password Defender


This is a project of making our passwords safer. This program can generate password randomly and which includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, symbols, numbers and this convention of making password will make our information safer. Keywords: Python, Tkinter

Toosmart üîóWebsite


Quickly capture what‚Äôs on your mind and get a reminder later at the right place or time. Easily plan the day or any surprising moment. TooSmart makes it easy to capture any thought or To-Do list for yourself, and share it with your friends and family. Keywords: Java, Android App Development

Student Reg. Management System


This project is about student registration management system. Main features of this project are User (Teacher) Login and Registration System, Add New Student, Specific Course and Section Record, etc. Keywords: Python, SQLite

Bank-Management-System


This project is about Bank Management System. C language is used to make this project where included many types of Bank Section such as Withdraw, Deposit money, transaction, loan etc. Keywords: C

Fire Fighting Robot Car


With the advancement of technology especially in Robotics it is very much possible to replace humans with robots for fighting the fire. This would improve the efficiency of firefighters and would also prevent them from risking human lives. This project is about firefighting robor car using aurduino. Keywords: Python, SQLite

item.title: Publications
item.description:
Advances in Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain Technologies for Early Detection of Human Diseases

S. A. Shammi, P. Ghosh, A. Sutradhar, F. M. J. M. Shamrat, M. A. Moni, and T. E. A. d. Oliveira, ‚ÄúAdvances in artificial intelligence and blockchain technologies for early detection of human diseases,‚Äù IEEE Transactions on Computational Social Systems, pp. 1‚Äì28, 2024. üîóDOI: 10.1109/TCSS.2024.3449748

MONOVAB : An Annotated Corpus for Bangla Multi-label Emotion Detection

S. K. Banshal, S. Das, S. A. Shammi, and N. R. Chakraborty ‚ÄúMONOVAB : An Annotated Corpus for Bangla Multi-label Emotion Detection,‚Äù Under Review. üîóLink: arxiv.org/abs/2309.15670

Exploring the Relationship between Cardiac Disease and Patterns of 12-Lead ECG Through Neural Network: A Comprehensive Review

A. Sufian, N. Chakraborty, S. Shammi, and S. Banshal, ‚ÄúExploring the Relationship between Cardiac Disease and Patterns of 12-Lead ECG through Neural Network: A Comprehensive Review‚Äù, ASSA, vol. 24, no. 02, pp. 66-93, Jul. 2024. üîóDOI: doi.org/10.25728/assa.2024.2024.02.1601

A Substantial Deep Learning Approach for Classification of Local and Coastal Fish

S. Das, S. A. Shammi, and D. M. Raza, ‚ÄúA substantial deep learning approach for classification of local and coastal fish,‚Äù in Advanced Computing, Cham: Springer Nature Switzerland, 2023, pp. 362‚Äì373, isbn:978-3-031-35641-4. doi: 10.1007/978-3-031-35641-4_29 üîóDOI:10.1007/978-3-031-35641-4_29

A Comprehensive Roadmap on Bangla Text-Based Sentiment Analysis

Shumaiya Akter Shammi, Sajal Das, Narayan Ranjan Chakraborty, Sumit Kumar Banshal, and Nishu Nath. 2022. A Comprehensive Roadmap on Bangla Text-Based Sentiment Analysis. ACM Trans. Asian Low-Resour. Lang. Inf. Process. üîóDOI:10.1145/3572783

FishNet: Fish Classification using Convolutional Neural Network

S. A. Shammi, S. Das, M. Hasan and S. R. Haider Noori, ‚ÄúFishNet: Fish Classification using Convolutional Neural Network,‚Äù 2021 12th International Conference on Computing Communication and Networking Technologies (ICCCNT), Kharagpur, India, 2021, pp. 1-5, doi: 10.1109/ICCCNT51525.2021.9579550. üîóDOI:10.1145/3572783
